title:
When local attractions offer free admission, why don\'t they include Brunswick County?  



We spend money while shopping and dining, we bring our visitors to these wonderful places.  Wilmington is the city we call our own because it is the only place that has all of these things in one place.  Brunswick is rural and we count on Wilmington for art, music, theater as well as other forms of recreation.



Janet Biro
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=16063
